ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST PA / LAT Chest radiograph Indication: Cough Comparison: Chest radiograph and CT chest both dated 02/07/2019 Technique: Frontal and lateral views of the chest. Findings: Stable cardiac pacemaker. Stable enlargement of the cardiac silhouette. Stable diffuse interstitial prominence. No lobar consolidation, pleural effusion, or pneumothorax. Impression: 1. Stable diffuse interstitial prominence which may relate to a combination of interstitial edema and chronic interstitial lung disease. No evidence for superimposed pneumonia. 2. Stable cardiac pacemaker.
